title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-2.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-2.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

This Subpart explains the application/recertification
process for MA including: (a) the
applicant's/recipient's obligations in verifying eligibility and continuing
eligibility; (b) the social
services district's obligation in verifying eligibility and continuing
eligibility; (c) the requirement
that the social services district explain the MA program to
applicants/recipients and inform them of other assistance and services for
which they may be eligible; and
(d) the responsibility of the social services district to make prompt eligibility
decisions and to notify applicants/recipients of decisions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
360-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
